titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE ASSESSMENT CONVERSION RATE - Description

div.p: NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE ASSESSMENT CONVERSION RATE is the total number of cases assessed as eligible for NHS Continuing Healthcare in the REPORTING PERIOD, as a percentage of the total number of cases assessed in the REPORTING PERIOD.
NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE ASSESSMENT CONVERSION RATE is derived from PERSONS NEWLY ELIGIBLE FOR NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE and PERSONS ASSESSED FOR NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE.
